for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = list((x % 2 for x in map(int, input().split())))
    odd = sum(a)
    even = n - odd
    print(0 if even == n else even)

tc = int(input())
for _ in range(tc):
    n = int(input())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    evenc = len(list(filter(lambda x: x % 2 == 0, a)))
    print(0 if evenc == 0 or n - evenc == 0 else evenc)
